HegemonPack:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
HegemonPack:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

HegemonMod:PhasedMysteriousStranger.NAME: Phased Mysterious Stranger
HegemonMod:PhasedMysteriousStranger.FLAVOR: That isn't meant to be in this world. Whoever put it here likes you. Hopefully.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. Replaces #rMysterious #rStranger. On gaining a debuff, gain 1 Artifact.

HegemonMod:PaperUmbrella.NAME: Paper Umbrella
HegemonMod:PaperUmbrella.FLAVOR: This is wildly out of place. A good find, nevertheless.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. Sin increases Necrotic damage by #b10% instead of #b7%.
